component.name: OSCR
component.summary: Open Source Combatlog Reader for Star Trek Online

description.p: OSCR (Open Source Combatlog Reader) parses and presents combat logs for Star Trek Online, giving players searchable, filterable views of combat performance, events, and statistics.
This AppImage bundles a relocatable Python runtime and all required dependencies so OSCR can run on most modern Linux distributions without installing system packages.
